metadata.name: Nplate 250 μg Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Treatment of chronic immune thrombocytopenic purpura

contraindications.disease: The most common adverse reactions 5 higher patient incidence in Nplate versus placebo are arthralgia dizziness insomnia myalgia pain in extremity abdominal pain shoulder pain dyspepsia and paresthesia Headache was the most commonly reported adverse reaction that did not occur at 5 higher patient incidence in Nplate versus placebo LD50 980 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Responses to platelet increase varies between patients thus indicating a need for individualization of dose However a dose dependent increase in platelet counts have been observed in clinical trials Does not affect platelet destruction

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of pulmonary toxicity can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Cyclophosphamide
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vindesine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vinorelbine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vincristine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vinblastine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vintafolide
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vinflunine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Romiplostim is combined with Vincamine
